entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sioux Lookout
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:03 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -30.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sioux Lookout Airport 07:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -30.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -33.7°C
Wind: SSW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 08:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
